forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. It will be windy at times, especially early. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds during the morning will give way to steady rain this afternoon. High 58F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. High 49F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 47F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 53F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
